content: have people read https://rust-lang.github.io/rustc-guide/how-to-build-and-run.html ? I want to know your impressions, if people understood it. I've skimmed it quickly and it seems to be a lot of room for improvement
I agree for improvement. I think I have gone through it once in my life for some work with measureme (IIRC)

have people read https://rust-lang.github.io/rustc-guide/how-to-build-and-run.html ? I want to know your impressions, if people understood it. I've skimmed it quickly and it seems to be a lot of room for improvement

I have... it's a mess
Right now, it is a dumping grounds for anything potentially useful about building the compiler. It might be better to break it into a bunch of smaller subchapters.

Mark, I was skimming it and seems hard to understand from there
anyway to give a more honest feedback I'd need to properly read it
